name: kalidokit
description: Kalidokit and cubism sdk testing area

scripts.build: npm run build:frontpage && npm run build:3d && npm run build:live2d
scripts.build:static: rm -rf public/assets && cp -r src/assets public/ && cp src/index.html public/index.html && cp src/style.css public/style.css && cp src/live2d/index.html public/live2d/index.html && cp src/live2d/style.css public/live2d/style.css && cp src/3d/index.html public/3d/index.html && cp src/3d/style.css public/3d/style.css
scripts.build:live2d-uglify: uglifyjs src/live2d/index.js -o public/live2d/index.js --compress --mangle && uglifyjs src/live2d/utils/constants.js -o public/live2d/utils/constants.js

author: KarthikBharadwajS
